name: ConsolidatedEdison
0:
”Alexa Ask Consolidated Edison how much do i owe”
”What is my bill”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: consolidated edison
des: The skill is an easy way to point Consolidated Edison customers to the billing inquiry number or the rate information provider name and contact phone. Alexa will always have the latest phone numbers of the billing and rate departments as well as the latest name of the best rate provider at any given time.THIS SKILL IS NOT PROVIDED BY CONSOLIDATED EDISON
